title: This is why you ban kat EVERY CHAMP SELECT

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Shes so ridiculously easy to play and wins games way too easy.

Was good game doe 19/7. Malphite accuses me of scripting??

GG

replies.body: tl;dr a silver 5 baddie beats another silver 5 baddie.

But if Malzahar gets picked

rip kat

No. 1 they had a zed jungle -_- who had no idea what he was doing. 

No. 2 Every champion can be really strong if they are used correctly and the opposition is bad. Like the game you had.
 
No.3 alkali countered herself.....

just a tip: kat scales really well on penetration. its why haunting guise and sorc boots are the usual first back items for kat players.

so, the void staff should have been in the place of the rab. esp since the raw damage difference is in favour of the void staff, even at low MR values. thats if you arent getting a haunting guise atleast...
It's not visible for me. I'm assuming that's because of Riot's foolish decision to remove this functionality.
